Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Carnoustie Golf Hotel in Carnoustie, you'll be next to a golf course and minutes from Carnoustie Golf Links. This 4-star hotel is within the region of Tentsmuir Forest and Claypotts Castle.

Rooms
Stay in one of 85 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have shower/tub combinations and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and coffee/tea makers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages and body treatments. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including an indoor pool, a spa tub, and a sauna. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and wedding services.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Carnoustie Golf Hotel. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and laundry facilities. Planning an event in Carnoustie? This hotel has 11330 square feet (1053 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Carnoustie Golf Hotel. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Tentsmuir Forest - 10.8 km / 6.7 mi

The preferred airport for Carnoustie Golf Hotel is Dundee (DND) - 19.9 km / 12.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
